summary: Apex predator of logistics efficiency. 15+ years architecting zero-downtime dispatch systems for 60+ daily fuel-equivalent moves across CA/NV. Built automation that slashed scheduling latency 30% and guarantees 99% on-time delivery. Now turning that same surgical precision to fuel dispatch, inventory monitoring, and carrier orchestration—because trucks, dollars, and gallons all move on my command.

bullets: Commanded 20-driver fleet executing 60+ outbound agricultural shipments daily—direct analog to fuel tanker frequency across CA.
Engineered custom scheduling automation that cut driver downtime 30% and locked in 99% on-time delivery to Walmart/Costco, mirroring fuel retailer SLAs.
Maintained audit-ready DOT records and resolved real-time delivery exceptions—skills mapped 1:1 to fuel compliance and on-call problem solving.
Deployed Python/Selenium bots that auto-reconcile delivery data and freight invoices—eliminating 40% of manual clerical labor.
Built secure API gateways (JWT/Okta) protecting sensitive route and driver data—identical posture required for fuel dispatch systems.
Self-dispatched 100+ daily stops through traffic-dense CA corridors, sustaining 4.9+ performance rating via ruthless route optimization.
Handled on-road contingencies and customer escalations in real time—same muscle needed for after-hours fuel delivery calls.
Negotiated rates and scheduled 500+ carrier moves/week across CA/NV, managing P&L down to the penny—mirror of rack-price margin control.
Integrated TMS and automated load-tracking workflows, boosting invoice accuracy and carrier on-time performance 25%.

education: A.S. Computer Science (in progress) – Modesto Junior College
